code: @Override public boolean matches(ConditionContext context, AnnotatedTypeMetadata metadata) {     MultiValueMap<String, Object> attrs = metadata.getAllAnnotationAttributes(Profile.class.getName()).     if (attrs != null) {         for (Object value : attrs.get("value")) {             if (context.getEnvironment().acceptsProfiles(Profiles.of((String[]) value))) {                 return true.             }         }         return false.     }     return true. }
